name: Space Pop Ball
description:
Space Pop Ball - Play now and enjoy hundreds of mind-blowing levels packed with colorful bubbles, awesome boosters and highly challenging puzzles.
Pop bubbles and explore over hundreds awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups and features.
- Challenge your brain with hundreds of awesome levels filled with puzzles.
- Play and enjoy an addictive gameplay.
- Beautiful bubble design, cool graphics and effects.
- Easy to play, but can be tricky to master.
- Smash all bubbles and win levels.
- Pop bubbles and clear the board.
